text:
Hiya :wave:

Are we not allowed to put the React files for cards within subfolders? Getting the following error:
```--- /app/extensions/company/Links.jsx failed with the following error ---
[ERROR] This extension file has an invalid file path: /app/extensions/company/Links.jsx. Make sure the extension file has a valid file path and try again. Example: /{appDirectory}/extensions/{extensionFile}.{ext}```
I think the parent card has to be directly in the extensions folder, but any child components and cards can be in sub folders

Has anyone messed around with this one yet? Does this mean we can just put 1 card in the right sidebar or does this mean we could have multiple cards in the sidebar for a singular grouping?
i.e. for a contact with 3 deals associated and building a component for this, would we have 3 separate cards  or 1 card with the info for all 3 deals within
